name: Dan Gurney
introduction: Daniel Sexton "Dan" Gurney (born April 13, 1931, died January 14, 2018) was a former Formula One driver and team owner. He was born in New York state, but spent almost his entire life living in California.[2] Gurney would develop a cult following during his years in Grand Prix racing, which saw the American take four wins in eighty six starts.[3]
